entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
